title: Update UI to TikTok-like theme/style

requirements.text: Restyle the app with a TikTok-like visual theme and format while keeping the existing winner verification flow unchanged (lookup → activation → eligibility → identity upload → receipt → completion). The new look should be predominantly dark, high-contrast, and modern, with neon accent highlights (e.g., cyan and hot pink), bold display typography, and a mobile-first layout aesthetic reminiscent of TikTok UI patterns (clean dark surfaces, punchy accent CTAs, subtle glow accents, tight spacing, rounded UI).

quotes: Make it look like TikTok theme format or style

acceptanceCriteria: Global theme tokens in frontend/src/index.css are updated to a dark, TikTok-like palette (dark background/card, high-contrast foreground, neon accent primary/secondary) without breaking Tailwind/shadcn token usage.

All existing screens (PrizeLookup, ActivationFlow, EligibilityFlow, IdentityVerification, ReceiptMethod, CompletionScreen) visually match the new theme: buttons, alerts, cards, inputs, icons, borders, and muted text are consistent and readable on dark backgrounds.
The overall layout feels more mobile-first: content widths, spacing, and component sizing are adjusted to look good on small screens while remaining responsive on desktop.
No changes introduce new business logic or new steps in the flow; only presentation/styling/layout changes are made.

requirements.text: Update the app shell (Header/Footer) and page layout to better match a TikTok-like format: use a darker header/footer treatment, tighten vertical spacing, and apply subtle neon accent cues (e.g., active icon/color highlights, thin accent dividers, or soft glow shadows) while preserving existing text content and links.

quotes: Make it look like TikTok theme format or style

acceptanceCriteria: Header (frontend/src/components/Header.tsx) and Footer (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) adopt the new dark/neon styling while keeping the same content, logo rendering, and the caffeine.ai attribution link intact.
App layout in frontend/src/App.tsx remains functional, but visually aligns with the new theme (background, container padding, and section spacing updated consistently).

requirements.text: Update existing generated brand images to visually match the TikTok-like dark/neon theme and update the UI to reference the updated assets.

quotes: Make it look like TikTok theme format or style

acceptanceCriteria: Updated image assets are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced by the existing components that render them (e.g., Header and PrizeLookup).
All updated images remain crisp and legible on dark backgrounds and match the neon-accent style.
No images are served via the backend; all images are loaded as static assets from /assets/generated/ paths.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components must be composed/overridden via tokens and utility classes).
Do not edit immutable hook/bootstrapping paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Backend is out of scope for this request; do not add or change Motoko functionality.
nonGoals: Adding new features (e.g., video feed, likes/comments UI, social interactions).
Changing the verification flow logic, statuses, or simulated/mock behaviors.
Introducing third-party assets or external UI libraries beyond what is already in the project.

Update to a TikTok-like dark/neon logo mark (logo.dim_512x512.png > logo-tiktok.dim_512x512.png)
Update to a TikTok-like neon trophy icon on transparent background (trophy-icon-transparent.dim_200x200.png > trophy-icon-neon.dim_200x200.png)
Update to a TikTok-like neon face verification icon on transparent background (face-verify-icon.dim_150x150.png > face-verify-icon-neon.dim_150x150.png)
Update to a TikTok-like neon verification badge on transparent background (verification-badge.dim_100x100.png > verification-badge-neon.dim_100x100.png)
Update to a TikTok-like dark/neon celebration background with confetti/glow accents (celebration-bg.dim_1200x800.png > celebration-bg-tiktok.dim_1200x800.png)

preferencesToAdd: Prefer a TikTok-like dark UI theme with neon accent colors and a mobile-first layout aesthetic.
